section.name: Subroutine Library In COntrol Theory
section.chapter_description: SLICOT provides numerical algorithms for computations in systems and control theory.

keyword.name: SLICOT License
keyword.description: About SLICOT license.

keyword.name: slicot_ab01od
keyword.description: Staircase form for multi-input systems using orthogonal state and input transformations.

keyword.name: slicot_ab04md
keyword.description: Discrete-time / continuous-time systems conversion by a bilinear transformation.

keyword.name: slicot_ab07nd
keyword.description: Inverse of a given linear system.

keyword.name: slicot_ab08nd
keyword.description: Construction of a regular pencil for a given system such that its generalized eigenvalues are invariant zeros of the system.

keyword.name: slicot_ag08bd
keyword.description: Zeros and Kronecker structure of a descriptor system pencil.

keyword.name: slicot_mb02md
keyword.description: Solution of Total Least-Squares problem using a SVD approach.

keyword.name: slicot_mb03od
keyword.description: Matrix rank determination by incremental condition estimation.

keyword.name: slicot_mb03pd
keyword.description: Matrix rank determination by incremental condition estimation (row pivoting).

keyword.name: slicot_mb03rd
keyword.description: Reduction of a real Schur form matrix to a block-diagonal form.

keyword.name: slicot_mb04gd
keyword.description: RQ factorization with row pivoting of a matrix.

keyword.name: slicot_mb04md
keyword.description: Balancing a general real matrix.

keyword.name: slicot_mb05od
keyword.description: Matrix exponential for a real matrix, with accuracy estimate.

keyword.name: slicot_mc01td
keyword.description: Checking stability of a given real polynomial.

keyword.name: slicot_sb01bd
keyword.description: Pole assignment for a given matrix pair (A,B).

keyword.name: slicot_sb02od
keyword.description: Solution of continuous- or discrete-time algebraic Riccati equations (generalized Schur vectors method).

keyword.name: slicot_sb03md
keyword.description: Solution of continuous- or discrete-time Lyapunov equations and separation estimation.

keyword.name: slicot_sb03od
keyword.description: Solution of stable continuous- or discrete-time Lyapunov equations (Cholesky factor).

keyword.name: slicot_sb04md
keyword.description: Solution of continuous-time Sylvester equations (Hessenberg-Schur method).

keyword.name: slicot_sb04qd
keyword.description: Solution of discrete-time Sylvester equations (Hessenberg-Schur method).

keyword.name: slicot_sb10jd
keyword.description: Converting a descriptor state-space system into regular state-space form.

keyword.name: slicot_sg02ad
keyword.description: Solution of continuous- or discrete-time algebraic Riccati equations for descriptor systems.

keyword.name: slicot_tb01id
keyword.description: Balancing a system matrix corresponding to a triplet (A, B, C).

keyword.name: slicot_tg01ad
keyword.description: Balancing the matrices of the system pencil corresponding to a descriptor triple (A-lambda E, B, C).
